title: Prime Minister extends Eid-ul-Adha greetings to chief ministers
content:
LAHORE, Jun 08 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif on Sunday extended Eid-ul-Adha greetings to the chief ministers of all four provinces during telephonic conversations.
The Prime Minister spoke with Punjab Chief Minister Maryam Nawaz, Sindh Chief Minister Syed Murad Ali Shah, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Chief Minister Ali Amin Gandapur, and Balochistan Chief Minister Mir Sarfraz Bugti.
During the calls, the Prime Minister conveyed his heartfelt Eid-ul-Adha wishes to the provincial leaders. In response, all four chief ministers thanked the Prime Minister for his gesture and reciprocated the Eid greetings. They also expressed their best wishes for the Prime Minister.
